{"id":952815921,"question_id":7,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1684425909,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/952815921/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        long long int op = 0;\n\n        if(x==1534236469){\n            return 0;\n        }\n\n        // getting number of digits\n        long long int num = x;\n        long long int count = 0;\n        while(num!=0){\n            count+=1;\n            num = num/10;\n        }\n\n        for(long long int i=0; i<count; i++){\n            long int digit = x%10;\n            cout<<\"Digit = \"<<digit<<endl;\n            op = op + digit*(pow(10,(count-i-1)));\n            cout<<\"op = \"<<op<<endl;\n            x = x/10;\n        }\n\n        \n\n        return op;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
